name: Sorry for the time you're about to lose playing this wad!
description: This is a medium large single player PWAD for Doom2, but you can play it on deathmatch and cooperative levels as well. You don't have to be a Doom-addict to finish this level, but it helps...:-). When you are almost by the exit whatch your steps because you'll only get 1 (one!) change to reach it!!! So take care...
